name: functions
description: // Database setup 1) brew install postgresql@14 2) brew services start postgresql@14 3) Now go into the server and create .env file with the following content.DATABASE_URL="postgresql://postgres:postgres@user.c0fo0cumqafz.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com:5432/user" 4) npx prisma generate 5)npx prisma migrate dev --name init_user_schema 6)Next in package.json add this "scripts": {     "seed": "prisma db seed"   }   and create a file seed.js in prisma folder with the following content:   import { PrismaClient } from "@prisma/client"; const prisma = new PrismaClient();
